name: 王貞淑
objective: 介紹 C 語言基本資料處理的概念， 包含基本輸入與輸出、程式的流程控制、函數的應用等指令之撰寫、程式之編輯、編譯、聯絡與程式之執行，並發展一套應用程式。
schedule:
1	Chapter 0, The Concept of C Language,語言介紹、程式製作流程、Integrated Development Environment (IDE) 介紹
2	Chapter 1, Overview of Computers and Programming	Hardware, Software, Programming, Software Development Method
3	Chapter 2, Overview of C	C Language Elements, Data type, Variable Declarations, Arithmetic Expressions, Common Programming Errors
4	Chapter 3, Top-Down Design with Functions,Library Functions, Top-Down Design and Structure Charts, Function & Arguments
5	Chapter 4, Selection Structures: If and Switch Statements,Control Structures, If…else statements, Nested if Statements 
6	Chapter 4, Selection Structures: If and Switch Statements; Chapter 5 Repetition and Loop Statements,Switch statements, Common Programming Errors, Repetition in Programs , For … loop
7	Chapter 5 ,Repetition and Loop Statements	Nested Loops, While and do … while loops
8	Chapter 5, Repetition and Loop Statements , Chapter 6 Modular Programming	Break and continue , Functions with parameters
9	Chapter 6 ,Modular Programming,Formal Output parameter as actual arguments
10	期中考
11	Chapter 7, Simple Data Types,Representation and Conversion of Numeric/Char Types, Enumerated Types
12	Chapter 8, Arrays,Call by reference, max scan and min scan
13	Chapter 8, Arrays,Searching and Sorting Arrays, multi-dimension array
14	Chapter 9, String,The Concept of String, String Function,  Character Operations, String-to-Number and Number-to-String Conversion
15	Chapter 11,C File Processing ,file open/read/write/close
17	Chapter 14, Dynamic Data Structure,Pointers (only)
18	期末考
scorePolicy:
1. 期中考
2. 期未考
3. 作業
4. 出席與課堂表現
